name: /home$help
description:
The year?

2003.

The crew?

A top of the line artificial intelligence machine.

The mission?

Make a toasted sandwich.

/home$help is a very short puzzle game made for WOWIE! jam 4.0. The theme is "collaborate with AI".

The programming, concept and direction was done by me, Sam. Hello.

The prerendered sprites (that's the robot, the background, the ending card, and all the items except the butter) and the cover art were drawn by Sadie, my sister.

The editing of these sprites, plus the sprite for the butter (the worst sprite*), and some miscellaneous HTML and admin was by Ben Evans, my own brother, and twitter's own @automatedbagel.

The music in this game is "On hold for you" written by Kevin Macleod. You can download it (and all his other stuff) royalty-free at incompotech.com.

Also some of the sound effects were made in bfxr, which you can get for free at bfxr.net.

*i tried to tell ben this is the only reason anyone played the game. he said i was wrong. go unfollow him on twitter #benevanssweep
